TopicTitle: The selection sounds spams itself when you press esc while dragging a slider

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.1 (latest) | Mods: Community Fixes, Leek, Kerbal Life Hacks, K2-D2, Node Manager, Flight Plan, SpaceWarp, BepInEx, Premonition for SpaceWarp, Patch Manager | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G | GPU: GTX 1050 Ti | RAM: 16GB 3200MHz

 

Basically, i was trying to change my conic patch limit, i pressed escape while dragging and the dragging sound kept playing. It even changed its sounds when i selected some ui elements.

Severity: Low

Frequency: Always

Steps to reproduce:

1. Go into settings and find a slider (preferably the conic patch one)

2. Drag that slider, and while dragging press escape to close the menu. Now the sound should keep playing.
